title: What is my purpose on this website?
content: I am currently honing my web development skills through the creation of my personal website. This project serves as a valuable platform for me to apply and expand my knowledge of web development, allowing me to experiment with various technologies, design principles, and interactive features. By undertaking this endeavor, I aim to showcase my abilities, share my passion for web development, and ultimately create an engaging online presence that reflects my evolving expertise in this field.

title: What am I testing on this website?
content: On this website, I am actively engaged in an enriching learning journey encompassing various facets of web development, including both back-end and front-end development. Through this platform, I am cultivating my skills, knowledge, and expertise in these critical areas of the digital realm. My exploration into web development encompasses the intricate world of back-end development, where I delve into the creation and management of server-side functionalities, databases, and server infrastructure. This involves mastering programming languages such as TypeScript, JavaScript, or Node.js, and working with frameworks like Next.Js, Angular, or Express.js. Simultaneously, I am immersing myself in the art of front-end development, where I focus on crafting engaging and user-friendly interfaces. My journey in front-end development involves mastering HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and TypeScript, as well as utilizing popular libraries and frameworks like React and Next.Js. This enables me to create responsive and visually appealing websites that provide an exceptional user experience. In essence, this website serves as both a canvas for my ongoing learning process and a testament to my dedication to becoming a proficient web developer. Additionally, I have integrated Google Analytics to test and enhance my analytical skills in understanding visitor data and continuously improve the user experience. Through continuous exploration, practice, and refinement of my skills, I am committed to staying at the forefront of web development trends and technologies, ultimately striving for excellence in this dynamic and ever-evolving field.

title: What Tools using on this website?
content: React: A JavaScript library for building user interfaces. Framer Motion: A motion library for React that provides animation capabilities. Next.js: A framework for building server-rendered React applications. Google Tag Manager: A tool for managing and deploying marketing tags on a website. Tailwind CSS: Tailwind CSS is a utility-first CSS framework that allows you to rapidly build custom user interfaces. Features: Animation: The project uses Framer Motion to add animations and transitions to components. Image Optimization: The project uses an image component, likely provided by Next.js, for optimizing and displaying images. Routing: The project likely uses Next.js or a similar library for handling client-side routing between different pages. State Management: The project uses React's useState hook for managing state within functional components. Languages: JavaScript (JS): The primary programming language used in the project. TypeScript (TS): The project may also use TypeScript, as indicated by the file extension .tsx.
